rules.description: Never expose full account or credit card numbers.
rules.suggestion: Mask all but the last four digits of card numbers.
Explain investment risks instead of promising returns.

rules.description: Always obtain explicit customer consent before sharing financial data with third parties.
rules.llm_instruction: Verify documented consent before any data sharing; otherwise BLOCK the request.
rules.example_violation: Sending transaction history to marketing partner
rules.suggestion: Obtain and record customer consent before data sharing.

rules.description: Never make lending decisions based on protected attributes.
rules.example_violation: We avoid loans in minority neighborhoods
rules.suggestion: Base lending decisions on financial criteria only.

rules.description: Do not share insider tips or non-public financial information.
rules.llm_instruction: If text contains non-public financial details intended for trading advantage, BLOCK and log.
rules.example_violation: Buy shares before earnings announcement tomorrow
rules.suggestion: Share only information that is already public.
